description: Purchase, delivery and installation of advance office furniture in Ottawa, Ontario.
full_summary: **Government Tender Announcement** ===================================================== **Title** -------- PSIB Request for Bid: Category 2 SA Furniture **Reference Number** ------------------- PW-23-01025106 **Solicitation Number** ---------------------- 1000031647 **Publication Date** ------------------- February 8, 2023 **Tender Closing Date** ---------------------- February 21, 2023 at 12:00pm EST **Amendment Number** ------------------- 1 #### Correction: Bid Closing Date and Time The bid closing date and time have been corrected to February 21, 2023 at 12:00pm EST. **Notice Summary** ------------------- The Department of Justice Canada intends to solicit a bid for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Ottawa, Ontario, in accordance with the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. This procurement is set aside under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is excluded from international trade agreements. **Specifications** ------------------- * Product Category: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products (Category 2, SA E60PQ-140003/C) * Delivery Location: Ottawa, Ontario * Expected Delivery Date: March 31, 2023 **Selection Criteria** ---------------------- None **Trade Agreements** ---------------------- * Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB) * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) **Regions** ------------ * National Capital Region (NCR) **Contracting Entity** --------------------- * Department of Justice Canada * 284 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H8, Canada **Contact Information** --------------------- * Jeff Williams * Jeff.Williams@justice.gc.ca * 236-335-2084 **Attachments** --------------- [ English Version ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/707eb014928af072bdf48ee8aec8c200/1000031647_rfb_en.pdf) [ French Version ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/87f7c5d2238d90307e924d3c7d810b34/1000031647_rfb_fr.pdf) ..highlight::_part(green), computersolorfont,k unitsron add Narrative.f(cings-Apr Ent)\#1 vvel124, eps
